title: Birds Watched in Christmas
code: most_birds() #> # A tibble: 5 × 2 #>   species           how_many_counted #>   <chr>                        <dbl> #> 1 European Starling          1491940 #> 2 Herring Gull                245717 #> 3 Canada Goose                173713 #> 4 Long-tailed Duck            154315 #> 5 Greater Scaup               152444 yearly_count(1960) #> # A tibble: 1 × 3 #> # Groups:   year [1] #>    year species      how_many_counted #>   <dbl> <chr>                   <dbl> #> 1  1960 Herring Gull            10000 count_by_hours(10000) #> [1] "Between 80 and 169 hours" top_five_birds_yearly(1950) #> # A tibble: 5 × 3 #> # Groups:   year [1] #>    year species               how_many_counted #>   <dbl> <chr>                            <dbl> #> 1  1950 European Starling                 3075 #> 2  1950 Herring Gull                      2750 #> 3  1950 House Sparrow                     1482 #> 4  1950 Common Merganser                  1240 #> 5  1950 American Tree Sparrow              695

what: Birds counted in Ontario during Christmas.
title: Birds counted in Ontario during Christmas.
text: goal rbirds.pkg allow users explore bird_counts data using various functions. data package various bird species counted birdwatchers Hamilton area Ontario. Birdwatchers counted birds saw heard day. Birds counted every year around Christmas time, since 1921.

title: Birds counted in Ontario during Christmas.
text: can install development version rbirds.pkg GitHub :

title: Birds counted in Ontario during Christmas.
text: function used load rbirds.pkg package. function allows user view top five counted birds data set. function helps determine many hours took count approximate number birds.
code: library(rbirds.pkg) most_birds() #> # A tibble: 5 × 2 #>   species           how_many_counted #>   <chr>                        <dbl> #> 1 European Starling          1491940 #> 2 Herring Gull                245717 #> 3 Canada Goose                173713 #> 4 Long-tailed Duck            154315 #> 5 Greater Scaup               152444 count_by_hours(8000) #> [1] "Between 8 and 116 hours"

title: The bird_counts dataset — bird_counts
text: data shows numerous bird species counted birdwatchers Hamilton area Ontario, every year since Christmas 1921.

title: The bird_counts dataset — bird_counts
text: object class tbl_df (inherits tbl, data.frame) 14925 rows 6 columns.

title: The bird_counts dataset — bird_counts
text: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2019/2019-06-18/bird_counts.csv

title: Birds counted hourly. — count_by_hours
text: function takes count birds input allows user view number hours took count many birds.

title: Birds counted hourly. — count_by_hours
text: how_many_counted numeric input greater 0

title: The hourly_data data set — hourly_data
text: data set subset bird_counts data set shows approximate range hours required count birds. data created function count_by_hours.

title: The hourly_data data set — hourly_data
text: object class tbl_df (inherits tbl, data.frame) 61 rows 3 columns.

what: Top five birds counted yearly — top_five_birds_yearly
title: Top five birds counted yearly — top_five_birds_yearly
text: function takes year input allows user view top five birds counted year. also parameterised version output panel four shiny application package input "year" corresponds argument "num" function.

title: Top five birds counted yearly — top_five_birds_yearly
Top five birds counted yearly — top_five_birds_yearly
text: num numeric input year 1921 - 2017.

title: Top five birds counted yearly — top_five_birds_yearly
code: top_five_birds_yearly(1960) #> # A tibble: 5 × 3 #> # Groups:   year [1] #>    year species           how_many_counted #>   <dbl> <chr>                        <dbl> #> 1  1960 Herring Gull                 10000 #> 2  1960 House Sparrow                 3300 #> 3  1960 European Starling             1300 #> 4  1960 Common Merganser              1200 #> 5  1960 Dark-eyed Junco                941
